title: How to Sell Your Stamp Collection

steps.headline: Make sure you know exactly what kind of stamps you are selling.
steps.description: Use eBay to try to match stamp images with stamps from your own collection, learn about what kind of information other sellers use to best describe your stamps.

steps.headline: Make sure you understand how to describe the condition of your stamps.
steps.description: Condition is very important when determining the value of individual stamps.

steps.headline: When you've got a good idea about how you're going to describe your collection to possible buyers, list your stamps on an online auction site.

text: Make sure you know exactly what kind of stamps you are selling. Use eBay to try to match stamp images with stamps from your own collection, learn about what kind of information other sellers use to best describe your stamps. Make sure you understand how to describe the condition of your stamps. Condition is very important when determining the value of individual stamps. When you've got a good idea about how you're going to describe your collection to possible buyers, list your stamps on an online auction site.
